I'm no market expert. Invest in skills and education. Skills are hard to earn but also hard to lose. 

I'm still learning every day and that's the greatest benefit I have found.

1065251781247066112.text:
On the way down there's a frantic search for someone to blame: speculators, forkers, pump and dumpers, whales, market manipulators, exchange bots, deep state, deep fryers, aliens. 

This too shall pass. It's no more fundamentals-based than the crazy rise.

/

1065250459194015744.text:
If you ask "why has crypto gone down so fast" answer is the same as "why did crypto go up so fast last year". 

New tech, price mostly driven by speculators - means that the price reflects the price, instead of tech fundamentals (which exist & are strong but are hard to measure).
